examples: The beginning of the movie was very slow.
In the beginning, the universe was created.
O começo do filme foi muito lento.
No começo, o universo foi criado.

suggested: Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems from the beginning!
The beginning of a journey can often be bittersweet, as we leave behind the familiar and venture into the unknown.
It's frustrating when you work hard on something from the beginning, only to have it fall apart at the end.
The beginning of the universe is still a mystery, with theories ranging from the Big Bang to the multiverse.
The smell of a new book is one of the best things about the beginning of a new reading adventure.
The smooth feel of a fresh sheet of paper at the beginning of a writing project is so satisfying.
The beginning of a new friendship can be exciting and nerve-wracking, but it's worth it to make that connection.
